snippet: The attack appeared to be the work of organized criminals, according to an official from the state prosecutor’s office.
abstract: Mexican authorities say that gunmen burst into a house in Acapulco, killing four people, including a pregnant woman and a 3-year-old girl, and wounding one person; say attack appears to be the work of organized criminals.
lead_paragraph: The attack appeared to be the work of organized criminals, according to an official from the state prosecutor’s office.

headline.main: Mexico: Attack Kills Four in Acapulco
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Attack Kills Four in Acapulco
